name: Fashionista Pet Salon
description:
Pamper your pet with the ultimate in luxury. Be a fashion guru as your pets make bow-wowing statements. We are sure that heads will turn as people see your pet with cool clothes and accessories!!!
Features:
•Wide range of cool shirts, caps, goggles, hair and ties.
•Express your love for your dog with a gift.
•Earn coins and stars to unlock amazing clothes and accessories in each level!
•Take a picture of your cute dog in different backgrounds.
•Earn daily bonus.
•Share with friends on Facebook.

As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements.
